references.paper_title: Training data-efficient image transformers & distillation through attention
references.reason: This paper is foundational for the efficient training of vision transformers, a key component of the proposed PIIP network.

references.paper_title: Learning transferable visual models from natural language supervision
references.reason: This paper introduced CLIP, a model that is leveraged in the multimodal understanding aspect of the PIIP network.

references.paper_title: Vision transformer adapter for dense predictions
references.reason: This paper details a multi-scale approach using ViT and CNNs, providing a strong foundation for the multi-branch design of PIIP.
This paper introduced ConvNeXt, a high-performing CNN architecture which is used as a backbone in the PIIP network.
Mask R-CNN is a widely used object detection model, used as a baseline and performance metric for the proposed PIIP network in visual perception tasks.
